events.name: Trigger
events.description: Sent when an incident is newly created/triggered.

events.name: Acknowledge
events.description: Sent when an incident has had its status changed from triggered to acknowledged.

events.name: Unacknowledge
events.description: Sent when an incident is unacknowledged due to timeout.

events.name: Resolve
events.description: Sent when an incident has been resolved.

events.name: Assign
events.description: Sent when an incident has been manually reassigned to another user in a different escalation chain.

events.name: Escalate
events.description: Sent when an incident has been escalated to another user in the same escalation chain.

events.name: Delegate
events.description: Sent when an incident has been reassigned to another escalation chain.
